1.0.name: wordpress/writescroll
1.0.description: On monitors with limited vertical resolution (often the case with laptops), the post/page editor can appear inconveniently far down on the page. With the WriteScroll plugin active, these pages will automatically scroll to an optimal position for editing, when you visit Write Post or Write Page.
